section.p: Indicates a Veteran's stint in active military service.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] branchCode with data type Code
The specific branch of the military.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRange with data type Time Interval
The timeframe the Vet served in the military branch.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
The unique identifier for this military service stint.

Contains exactly one [1..1] militaryServiceId with data type Id
A unique identifier for this military service act.

Contains at least one [1..*] qualifyingServiceDetail, where its type is Qualifying Service Detail
qualifyingServiceDetail.

Contains exactly one [1..1] militaryServiceConflict, where its type is Military Service Conflict
militaryServiceConflict.

Contains exactly one [1..1] branchCode with data type Code
The specific branch of the military.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRange with data type Time Interval
The timeframe the Vet served in the military branch.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
The unique identifier for this military service stint.

Contains exactly one [1..1] militaryServiceId with data type Id
A unique identifier for this military service act.

Contains at least one [1..*] qualifyingServiceDetail, where its type is Qualifying Service Detail
qualifyingServiceDetail.

Contains exactly one [1..1] militaryServiceConflict, where its type is Military Service Conflict
militaryServiceConflict.
